body.name: DEPAD Nightstand with Charging Station and LED Light Strip, Night Stands with 2 Drawers, Side Table for Bedroom, LED Black Nightstands (13.78" D x 15.75" W x 23.62" H)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 24 mins
features: 【Convenient Charging Hub】Say goodbye to cluttered cords and lost charger cables with the Smart Nightstand's built-in charging station, featuring 2 AC Outlets, 2 USB Ports, and 1 Type-C. Effortlessly charge your phone, iPad, or AirPods as you drift off to sleep.

【Multifunctional LED Light】The night stands with charging station comes with the LED mood lights for when you need ambient light. Over 160000 colors, 58 Color Modes, Music/Mic Sync and timing function, You can freely design your light by Phone App + Remote Control.

【Ample Storage Solutions】Never run out of space with the 2 spacious drawers and open area of the night stand. Keep your bedside essentials organized and secure with the lip around the tabletop. The drawers open and close smoothly and are lined for easy installation.

【Sturdy & Durable】Built to last, the bedside table is made from environmentally friendly particle board material and boasts a premium wood-grain frosted surface that is easy to clean and maintain. The tabletop can support up to 66 Ib and each drawer can hold up to 15 Ib.

【Multi function】This compact and stylish LED nightstands can serve as a bedside table, end table, living room sofa side table, nightstand, home office printer stand, and more. It fits in seamlessly with any room décor, thanks to its modern design.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DEPAD Professional Side Table Bedroom with Charging Station Makes Organizing and Charging both Easy and Convenient.

The End Table is arranged with 2 AC Outlets +2 USB Ports+1 Type-C, perfect for charging your phone, iPad, or Air pods as you fall asleep. Note: lf the LED strip doesn't work, try to unplug the Type C charging cable and USB plug, then reconnect the light strip. USB ports may trigger power protection due to voltage differences.

No more bunches of cords around and the USB plugs come in handy when you lost the outlet part for charger. The nightstand is made from particle board material with premium wood-grain frosted surface, protect the tabletop from water stains and fingerprints.
The 3 easy-pull metal handle make the nightstands more stylish and waterproof. LED Light can be Controlled by App, you just need to scan the QR code to download the App.

Over 160000 colors, 58 Color Modes, Music/Mic Sync and timing function, You can freely design your light even outside the house. LED Light can be Controlled by Remote control. 58 Dynamic Modes, 10 Speed Grades, 5 Brightness Grades, 2 Music Sync and 4 Timer settings, you can personalize the Lights while lying in bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, size and look as expected
reviews.reviewText: Pros:1. Easy to assemble:- the DEPAD store sent a link to a video how to assemble even before nightstands arrived;- every package has a good screwdriver;- almost everywhere the same screw type used except for the side shelves screws and the top panel screws;- 13 parts to assemble only;- all holes drilled perfectly matching to others.2. Size is as announced, not sure why people expected a different size. Check the info first.3. The quality of wood is perfect.4. Rails for shelves are already installed.5. Great technical support - the DEPAD answers pretty quick to all questions via amazon.Cons:1. Some scratches and slightly damaged finishes/paintings might present on inner or outer sides of panels.2. Some edges have glue.3. No wheels (as announced), for some buyers it could become a problem because of the weight, but if you move nightstand without shelves installed, you will be fine. It is not heavy, but remember, it is made of wood.4. No place to keep light wires hidden.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and looks good but led adhesive isn’t too good strip comes off sometimes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice addition to the home.
reviews.reviewText: So at first I was a little intimidated when I opened the box, then when I first looked at the instruction manual it gave me a since that this was going to be a task. It ended up not being so, the instructions were simple and easy to follow, then there's a video which show's you how to put it together. The only thing I had wrong, at first, was the size. It was smaller than I had expected, but after putting it next to my bed it fit's well. The LED lights are a nice touch and make it stand out but, but what I like the most are the charging ports on top. Everything I need to charge is done right next to my bed. Very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice product that was easy to assemble. My son likes this side table for charging his stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for youngster
reviews.reviewText: My grandson wanted a small night stand for Christmas and this fit the bill. Size was perfect and everything worked as advertised. Dad was glad because it pushed him into cleaning up his room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Look good and is very sturdy. Easy to put together. Very small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy but very small and used?
reviews.reviewText: My first impression was very good until I took a better look and the wood looked used and scratched when first opened. After setting it up it was pretty sturdy and didn’t seem like it was going to fall apart or be wobbly. It is very small however and would be for a child’s room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LED lights did not work
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these nightstands and neither of the LED strip lights worked on them from day one. Although for me this wasn’t a big deal because I mostly just liked the design of the table and the fact it had the outlets on top, but definitely something to keep in mind if you’re buying for the lights. Other than that they are both very sturdy and it only took about 45 minutes to put together one of them, although the images in the instructions were quite small. The drawers roll nicely and I’m overall pretty happy with my purchase.
